data.title: Good value
data.text: Crispy crust, good quality toppings. Sauce could use more spice, but is good. Salads are good. Needs better choices of dressings.

data.title: Rude
data.text: Terrible service.  Don't get me wrong the food is good but not worth it to me. I arrive at the started time to pick up my pizzas when there card reader is having issues. It was not reading cards with security chips.  No big deal. They start trying to fix it.  A customer suggests entering the card number like a phone order and they say it's one button and they can't. First problem because they have the same machine I have at work just because they don't know how to use it they start making people leave to go to an atm and come back to get their food.  I only brought a credit card, license and phone so I had to drive all the way home them get cash to go back.  Once back it is now at least half am hour past my food being done so I ask if they are going to do anything for my inconvenience and more my certainly child food which is on oddly not my fault.  The poor cashier meekly apologized before 3 managers come and start in telling me off that it's not their fault about the credit machine (which is true and wasnt my real issue) and continued ranting about how "I'm causing a problem and I am free to go to any place else I want and they couldn't care." For a restaurant in a town that there are 3 other pizza places you can see from their parking lot you would think they'd at least attempt to be nice.  A simple apology would have sufficed instead of being told off and talked over until I walked out before saying something I would regret. Completely rude. Terrible customer service skills. Go anywhere else.

data.title: Favorite place for Saturday night food
data.text: Great little place. Food is fabulous and reasonably priced. Service is very good too. We go here all the time for pizza. Same owners for many many years ensures food consistency.

data.title: Classic staple of Bristol, CT.
data.text:
All expanses of my family and friends have frequented this local favorite for as long as anyone can remember. 
Standard pizza place menu with amazing, crunchy chicken wings and an incredible 'farmers market' pizza with feta.

data.title: Polish food at a pizza restaurant!
data.text: I love Polish food, so I was excited when I found out that Bristol Pizza makes potato and cheese pierogi! They even make golobki sometimes, which they will advertise on their sign. The prices are very reasonable for any of the dishes, the menu has a good amount of options, and the portions are great. I've picked up food a few times and eaten in the restaurant a few times. I think it's definitely worth a try!

data.title: Everything about this family business is wonderful.
data.text: Dishes are served hot, properly prepared and are delicious. Pizzas are especially good. Take-out is a busy time. Wait staff is courtesy, knowledgeable and service is quick.

data.title: Great crust
data.text: Friendly staff, great service, and the food is always tasty. We received a warm greeting upon arrival.  The staff was eager and ready to serve us, even though the restaurant was busy.  Our pizza order was delivered in an appropriate time, hot and ready to serve.  Good flavor and lots of toppings made it "one filling meal".  We will be stopping back next time through Bristol.

data.title: delicious pizza....
data.text: This is the best pizza even if they don't deliver to Plainville we will still order and drive out to pick up.  the toppings and sauce are delicious.  fresh and warm....the crust is perfect and the sizes are too!!

data.title: Very satisfied!
data.text: I don't like pizza!  But ever once in a while I go to a pizza place for my husbands sake.  I was very pleased and actually look forward to going again.  The crust was NOT soggy in the middle (maybe because I ordered a small) and the fillings were plentiful and fresh.   And good quality.  They had my favorite beer on draft, which I order very infrequently because it is not offered in most places.  This pizza place reminds me of pizza places of my childhood of the 60's - cozy and comfortable, and the service was fast.

data.title: Great take out place.
data.text: We love ordering take out pizza from this establishment.  Service is not consistently good, hit or miss.  Restaurant is small and parking can be an issue.  Food is excellent.

data.title: Deep Dish and Thin Crust had a Love Child
data.text:
If Deep Dish pizza and Thin Crust pizza had a love child, it is here at the Bristol Pizza Restaurant.

The outer crust is tall enough to accommodate the mounds of toppings, sausage, mushrooms, cheese and more on the signature pie. But unlike most deep dish pizzas, the crust is light and flaky like a croissant. On the bottom, it is thin and crisp. Yummy!

Business was steady both dine in and take out on Sunday of Memorial Day. The waitress lamented the slow pace so expect a crowd on a normal night.  

Definitely would have again when getting a pie in Bristol!

data.title: Best Greek Pizza
data.text: This is a really nice sit-down place.  The staff in the past has been rude and slow, but don't let that stop you from trying this deelish greek-style pizza.  I'm not entirely sure if the people who own it are, in fact, Greek, but the pizza is. I can never stop until the pie is done..even when I'm full.  Not free refills on the soda/pop and it's kind of a shocker if you don't know that ahead of time.  Clean and simple with lots of booths (I love booths).  No delivery, unfortunately.  My fav: perogies...yes, I know..but one of the owners is Polish and the perogies are homemade and prepared perfectly..little pricey on that dish, but if you have that kind of money..GET THEM, you will not be disappointed!.

data.title: Great place
data.text: You will never be disappointed with their menu or food. Their is always a crowd but the wait is well worth it.

data.title: Good Italian fast food
data.text: This small neighborhood pizza restaurant has some of the best pizza and grinders in the area. The employees are courteous and friendly.

data.title: Nice Little Restaurant
data.text: We have been eating at Bristol Pizza or getting takeout for years. Nice cozy ambiance and good food.

data.title: Very good pizza and decent prices
data.text: This place has great pizza and great toppings. I've only had the pizza, but it is so good I keep buying it again and again! Very good food at great prices.

data.title: great subs!
data.text: i always get the italian combo with the works and lots of pickles!! quite tasty! great bread! my wife gets the grilled chicken on her sub and enjoys it just as much!

user_location.name: New York City, New York, USA

data.title: Yum!
data.text: Pizza is great! Crispy crust is delicious. Haven't tried the rest of the menu. Staff is friendly and we never wait more than a few minutes for a table.
